comment: If you want an easy A, take this course. Everything is simple to understand for the most part, even despite last minute changes in her due dates. I had very little interaction with the professor herself, however I had a fun time being in this class. Workload is super manageable, and she makes sure to give you everything you need to succeed.

I had Professor Burel for my EDUC2110 course. I took it online and was unfortunately disappointed with her. She claimed she would be very attentive but only ever communicated with us last minute. She changed due dates and assignments often and didn't communicate them effectively. Her D2L is very unorganized and doesn't match the syllabus.
If you want an easy A this class is the way to go! She cares about her students and is so kind. Not strict at all when it comes to due dates. Her class is also fun and interactive! Def take her!

She was amazing! Truely cared about her students! She had due dates that were far in advanced and would give extra time if you asked. The assignments were easy and fun to do. The class was interactive and fun to be in. There are group projects.

Professor Burel is amazing !!! She is very understanding and patient. She is one of those professors who understand that her class isn't the only one that you are taking. Allowed you all semester to turn in past assignments and receive full credit still. Most assignments were done together in class. I got a 100 on every assignment.TAKETHISPROFESSOR

She is really sweet and knows what she is talking about. She doesn't grade things too hard and gives steps on everything. I was in her first class ever taught at KSU and she did things very well and things went surprisingly well.
Instructor Burel is amazing! She gives great feedback for all her assignments. She is very caring! Her class helped me figure out what I want to teach. Easy 100!

Mrs Burel is the sweetest professor and probably the nicest I've had in college. She makes her class super informative and interesting. All you have to do is complete the assignments which are super easy and understandable and you get an A. She did not have any ratings beforehand which I thought was risky but she is definitely worth taking.
